title: Ambient Sound Interval
description: Sets the entity's delay between playing its ambient sound.

event_name.description: Level sound event to be played as the ambient sound.
event_name.title: Event Name

event_names.description: List of dynamic level sound events, with conditions for choosing between them. Evaluated in order, first one wins. If none evaluate to true, 'event_name' will take precedence.

condition.description: The condition that must be satisfied to select the given ambient sound.
condition.title: Condition

event_name.description: Level sound event to be played as the ambient sound.
event_name.title: Event Name

range.title: Range
range.description: Maximum time in seconds to randomly add to the ambient sound delay time.

value.title: Value
value.description: Minimum time in seconds before the entity plays its ambient sound again.
